title: Microsoft Project 2013 for Beginners - Start Your MS Project Journey
headline: Learn how to create project plans, track progress, manage budgets and more in this free online Microsoft Project course.
description: This free online Microsoft Project for Beginners course will teach you how you can use Microsoft Project to develop detailed project plans. In this course learn how to use Project 2013 for developing project plans, assigning resources to tasks, tracking progress, managing budgets, and analysing workloads. You will also study the different ways of accessing help, and the different areas of the Workspace, and how to access Project templates online.
courseDescription:
Microsoft Project 2013 is one of the world's most widely used project management software tools and helps managers deliver work on-time and on-budget by turning project variables into vivid graphics and actionable data. With big picture and micro-level views, managers stay on top of deliverables throughout the lifespan of a project. Make sure your project ends up a success story with our Microsoft Project 2013 course.

By studying this course, you’ll become an expert at developing and managing projects using this key project management tool. Your professional instructor will give you the inside track on creating and managing tasks, allocating resources, defining deadlines, maximizing calendars, and more. Starting with the basics, you’ll discover how to design a custom project and use templates. Next, you’ll see how to integrate your data and turn it into a compelling report. You’ll then get useful tips for solving tricky Gantt Chart problems by learning to trace task paths. 

If you’re interested in project management as a future career, or if you’re a professional seeking to improve your project management skills, then this clear and simple course is the one for you. Knowing how to develop project plans, assig resources to tasks, track progress, manage budgets and analyse workloads are key skills in any project, so learning these skills is an absolute must for any aspiring project manager. So start this course today, and by the end of the week you’ll have gained valuable new skills in project management.

Start Course Now
certificateDetail:
All Alison courses are free to enrol study and complete. To successfully complete this course and become an Alison Graduate, you need to achieve 80% or higher in each course assessment. Once you have completed this course, you have the option to acquire an official Diploma, which is a great way to share your achievement with the world.

Your Alison is:
  • Ideal for sharing with potential employers
  • Include it in your CV, professional social media profiles and job applications.
  • An indication of your commitment to continuously learn, upskill & achieve high results.
  • An incentive for you to continue empowering yourself through lifelong learning.
Alison offers 3 types of Diplomas for completed Diploma courses:
  • Digital : a downloadable in PDF format immediately available to you when you complete your purchase.
  • : a physical version of your officially branded and security-marked , posted to you with FREE shipping.
  • Framed : a physical version of your officially branded and security marked in a stylish frame, posted to you with FREE shipping.

All are available to purchase through the Alison Shop. For more information on purchasing Alison , please visit our FAQs. If you decide not to purchase your Alison , you can still demonstrate your achievement by sharing your Learner Record or Learner Achievement Verification, both of which are accessible from your Dashboard. For more details on our pricing, please visit our Pricing Page
